LanguageData.tab.settings.desc: Enable and disable optional settings which effect which information is displayed
LanguageData.tab.gui.desc: Methods which are run on gui
LanguageData.tab.modder.desc: Methods which have been added by modders via Analyzer.xml
LanguageData.settings.showicon: Show the main tab icon on the bottom bar
LanguageData.settings.disable.cleanup.desc: Do NOT do this if you do not know what you are doing. This will prevent analyzer from cleaning up from after itself automatically. Analyzer can be forced to manually cleanup immediately by right clicking the menu tab button and selecting 'Cleanup'
LanguageData.devoptions.heading: Profile
LanguageData.top.pause.analyzer: Pause/Unpause profiling that the analyzer is done, this is not equivalent to unpatching
LanguageData.top.search: Search by name or time to filter which entries show
LanguageData.top.gc.tip: This will show a rough estimate of the memory consumed and thrown away at a given time
LanguageData.top.fps.tip: This will show your calculated frames per second
LanguageData.top.tps.tip: This will show your ticks per second, ticks are the metric the game uses to quantiy time passing, multiple ticks can happen per second, the game aims to reach 60tps at 1x
LanguageData.logs.name: Name
LanguageData.logs.max.desc: Sort the rows by the maximum (MS) peak the method has reached
LanguageData.logs.av.desc: Sort the rows by the average (MS) the method is reaching
LanguageData.logs.percent.desc: Sort the rows by relative percent in the category
LanguageData.logs.total.desc: Sort the rows by total (MS) impact
LanguageData.logs.calls.desc: Sort the rows by total amount of calls
LanguageData.logs.name.desc: Sort the rows in alphabetical order
LanguageData.entry.gui.colonistbar.tooltip: The colonist bar along the top of the screen
LanguageData.entry.gui.dotabs.tooltip: The inspect pane which opens up upon selecting a thing
LanguageData.entry.gui.gamecomponent.tooltip: The GUI methods for each gamecomponent
LanguageData.entry.gui.resourcereadout.tooltip: The UI function for the resource readout on the left of the screen
LanguageData.entry.gui.uiroot.tooltip: A variety of OnGUI methods for various types, including; UIRoot_Play, WindowStack, AlertsReadout, MainButtonsRoot
LanguageData.entry.gui.windowstack.tooltip: The OnGUI method for the window stack, should show profiling for all active windows
LanguageData.entry.tick.jobdrivertick.tooltip: A detoured profiler for the whole job driver tick including the cost of ticking each individual driver
LanguageData.entry.tick.single.tooltip: A variety of tick methods, including; World, History, FilthMonitor, Storyteller
LanguageData.entry.tick.pathfinder.tooltip: Shows a variety of methods which are used in pathfinding
LanguageData.entry.tick.gamecomponent.tooltip: The Tick methods for each gamecomponent
LanguageData.entry.tick.lord.tooltip: Lords are used for group AI, like weddings, raids, traders etc
LanguageData.entry.tick.stats.tooltip: A variety of methods which are used to calculate and looking up stat-based values
LanguageData.entry.tick.mapcomponent.tooltip: The Tick method for Map Components
LanguageData.entry.tick.needs.tooltip: Shows a variety of methods which are used in Needs calculations
LanguageData.entry.tick.pawngen.tooltip: Shows methods around PawnGen and generation of pawns for raids
LanguageData.entry.tick.pawn.tooltip: The variety of methods which are called on Pawn:Tick, including a variety of trackers
LanguageData.entry.tick.room.tooltip: The method which is responsible for the updating of room stats
LanguageData.entry.tick.thinknodes.tooltip: ThinkNodes are basically sets of general job givers filtered in an ai tree, like satisfying needs, optimizing apparel, fleeing, work is all combined in a single JobGiver_Work which can be individually profiled by looking at the Work Giver profiler tab
LanguageData.entry.tick.things.tooltip: Profiles the ticking methods of various things on the map
LanguageData.entry.tick.jobgiver.tooltip: Work Giver is only jobs done for work, that means all the jobs listed in the Work tab, this does not include jobs run by the ai for things like satisfying needs or optimizing apparel, those can be found in the ThinkNodes profile tab
LanguageData.entry.tick.jobgiverd.tooltip: Job Giver shows jobs which pro-actively seek out work to be done. For example. Fermenting barrels looking for ingredients, bills looking for resources, etc
LanguageData.entry.tick.world.tooltip: Tick methods for various world entries, such as; WorldPawns, Factions, Caravans
LanguageData.entry.update.alert.tooltip: The recalculate and draw methods for Alerts
LanguageData.entry.update.dynamicdraw.tooltip: The draw method for things which are drawn via the DynamicDrawManager
LanguageData.entry.update.gamecomponent.tooltip: The Update method for each gamecomponent
LanguageData.entry.update.harmonypatches.tooltip: Harmony patches added by mods (Prefixes and Postfixes only)
LanguageData.entry.update.harmonytranspilers.tooltip: Shows a semi-accurate profiling of all Harmony Transpilers, there is a writeup in the Wiki going into detail about it
LanguageData.entry.update.infocard.tooltip: A variety of methods which relate to info panels, including stats, and gui methods
LanguageData.entry.update.mapcomponent.tooltip: The Update method for Map Components
LanguageData.entry.update.transpilermethods.tooltip: Profiles entire methods that have transpiler patches, doesn't show the impact of individual changes, only the whole method, a transpiler might change how often some code in a method runs, not just call extra methods, use to compare how a method runs before and after adding a mod that patches it
LanguageData.entry.update.sectionlayer.thingsdrawlaye: Profile how long each thing takes to print
LanguageData.entry.update.sections.tooltip: Shows the regenerate method for SectionLayers (sectionlayers are things like Snow, SunShadows, Zones)
LanguageData.entry.update.pawnrenderer.tooltip: Shows the pawnrenderer function, which is responsible for the renderering of pawns and apparel
LanguageData.entry.update.sectionlayerthings.tooltip: More in-depth profiling of Section layers, including mesh creation and the TakePrintFrom function
LanguageData.entry.update.mapdrawer.tooltip: Draw method on each map section layer
LanguageData.entry.update.shooting.tooltip: Shows a variety of methods related to combat and shooting, including verbs, turrets, projectiles etc
LanguageData.entry.update.uiroot.tooltip: A variety of update methods for GUI-related functionality, such as; AlertsReadout, Messages, Tutor
LanguageData.entry.update.frametimes.tooltip: Shows entries which correlate to the frame times of your game (how long does each frame take to complete)
LanguageData.entry.update.custom.tooltip: Custom Profiled methods in the update category
LanguageData.entry.tick.custom.tooltip: Custom Profiled methods in the tick category
LanguageData.performance.sectionlayersnow: Improve the speed of rendering for snow
LanguageData.performance.sectionlayersnow.tooltip: Replaces a Mathf.Lerp with byte multiplication in the calculation for snow colour
LanguageData.performance.lordnotifydamage: Remove some stutters for raid AI
LanguageData.performance.lordnotifydamage.tooltip: Removes a redundant damage-notification check from the Lord toils 'LordToil_AssaultColony' and 'LordToil_AssaultColonySappers'
LanguageData.performance.killaudio.tooltip: Prevent music player bugs by destructively prefixing the 'MusicManagerPlay:MusicUpdate' function
LanguageData.performance.buildingrepair.tooltip: Removes objects that are not repairable or do not have hitpoints (which the Type 'ListerBuildingsRepairable' does not filter out)
LanguageData.performance.roof.tooltip: Caches when roofs are removed / need replacing, and preventing the jobgiver from running when no state has changed
LanguageData.performance.wallsnconduits: Optimize drawing for walls and conduits
LanguageData.performance.wallsnconduits.tooltip: Set the mesh draw type for walls and conduits to 'MapMeshOnly'
LanguageData.performance.compdeepdrill.tooltip: Skips a check for the 'correct' stone under a drill, improves performance of drills when using pawns with high mining
LanguageData.performance.tempcache.tooltip: Caches safe temperature range once per tick, reducing excess cpu load from spamming it for things like pathfinding
LanguageData.performance.zoom.tooltip: Lowers the target tps when panning to reduce stuttering
LanguageData.performance.drawlabelsfix.tooltip: Optimize the drawing of pawn and animal names in-map
LanguageData.temp.section.tooltip: Caches types in the constructor for 'Section' - this should be fixed in a future rw update
LanguageData.fix.fixmodremoval: Fix mod removal, may solve grey screen issue
LanguageData.fix.fixmodremoval.tooltip: This fixes the area manager trying to loop through null area classes from missing mods
LanguageData.fix.faction.tooltip: Removes all references to deleted factions in world objects. This will solve issues when removing factions mid-save
